name: Broken Chains (danixoon, djkreyz)
description:
Break the chains so they finally leave each other alone!

Controls:

  • Space - Shoot
  • Mouse - Aim

Contributors: 

  • danixoon - Programming and Game design
  • djkreyz - Sound, Art, Game design

The Ost: Boss Time - By David Renda

Broken Chains is a fast-paced shooter maid in 3 hours for Trijam #152 with the theme "Leave me alone"
